page.title: 06SUTTON VENY NEWSLETTER
page.content: The newsletter was started by one of the church vicars and is published by the village hall committee.About 37O copies are delivered free to the villages of Sutton Veny,Norton Bavant, Bishopthrow and Tytherington. It lets people know what is going on in the area and there are 14 organiz- ations in the area who all contribute to the newsletter at some time during the year and they write about the Sutton Veny flower show and other village events. It costs 5Op for private individuals to place an advert in the letter.The rest of the running costs are met by the Parish Councils of each village and the village hall committee. It is produced by typing onto sten- cils and run off on a hand operated Gestetner ink duplicator.
